SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.server

Class RMIServerImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.server.RMIServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServerImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMIServerInterface
Implementation of the RMIServerInterface using RMI. This class manages client connections and provides remote methods for client interaction. It maintains a mapping of connected RMIClientInterface objects to Client instances. extends UnicastRemoteObject to facilitate RMI communication.
See Also:
